text: Beyonce and Jay - Z held a hyper exclusive Push Party before the birth of their twins, son Sir and daughter Rumi, on June 12. And longtime pal La La Anthony was among the guests. But the 38 - year - old Power actress was very discreet when it came to revealing intimate details about the bash on Andy Cohen's Watch What Happens Live! on Sunday. Scroll down for video Fishing for info : La La Anthony mostly resisted Anthony Cohen's attempt to pry out details about pal Beyonce's Push Party when she appeared on his Watch What Happens Live Sunday The smiling celebrity was invited to answer quickfire questions on the Bravo show.
